sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { CartService } from 'src/app/services/cart.service'; import { Cart } from 'src/app/shared/models/Cart'; import { CartItem } from 'src/app/shared/models/CartItem'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart-page', templateUrl: './cart-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart-page.component.css'] }) export class CartPageComponent implements OnInit{ cart!:Cart constructor(private cartService:CartService){ } ngOnInit(): void { this.cartService.getCartObservable().subscribe((cart)=> this.cart=cart) } removeFromCart(cartItem:CartItem){ this.cartService.removeFromCart(cartItem.food.id) } changeQuantity(cartItem:CartItem,quantityInString:string){ let quantity=parseInt(quantityInString); this.cartService.changeQuantity(cartItem.food.id,quantity) } }

Your Cart

{{ cartItem.food.name }}
Price: ${{ cartItem.food.price.toFixed(2) }}

Checkout Summary

Total Price: {{ cart.totalPrice | currency:'INR' }}
Total Items: {{ cart.totalCount }}
